entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Saguenay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:57 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h increasing to 50 gusting to 70 late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with a few flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
